$log
***REMOVED*** in module ng

Description

Simple ***REMOVED*** for logging. Default implementation writes the message into the browser's console (if present).

The main purpose of this ***REMOVED*** is to simplify debugging and troubleshooting.

Dependencies

  • $window

Methods

  • debug()

    Write a debug message

  • error()

    Write an error message

  • info()

    Write an information message

  • log()

    Write a log message

  • warn()

    Write a warning message

Example
